text: Joe Buck (born April 25, 1969) is an American sportscaster. He works for Fox Sports. He is the son of late hall of fame broadcaster Jack Buck. Joe's jobs include: *NFL on Fox *MLB on Fox lead play by play *St. Louis Cardinals play- by-play *1999 Cotton Bowl Classic on Fox play-by-play *NTRA on Fox Host *Going Deep Host *Missouri Tigers men's basketball color commentator. In 2021, Joe Buck was a guest host on the popular syndicated game show Jeopardy! following the death of Alex Trebek. title: Joe Buck
